website_summaries.verdict: Smaller size and sleek look make it great for serving guests.
pros: Expensive-looking chrome and glass Art Deco piece that comes at a fraction of the cost
14-inch serving tray and two levels make it a great size for entertaining
cons: Quality of the materials is lower than more expensive options

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! Right size for me, as I was looking for a small bar cart, it looks very expensive and the price is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better than pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an anniversary gift for my hubby. So obviously I could not ask him to help assemble! It was super easy to assemble, it is a lovely size, maybe just slightly low, but it does not look odd. The finishes are really high-end looking and the glass trays are really heavy and sturdy looking. I originally wanted a gold cart, but found this one in my price range. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We just put the cart together last night. It's a nice piece, good value just a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: A.Luengas

customer_reviews.title: Good Value....
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about the size when I saw it online but once it was put together, it looked right. My only real gripe with this was the packing which was super wasteful. They had this thing in a box inside of a bigger box with all types of packing materials. Once it arrived, I simply followed the instructions and had it together in about 15 minutes. It actually holds more than I thought it would. What really sets it off is the chrome with the black finish on the glass. It makes your glass bottles and wine glasses pop. It is movable but I'm not sure how much you'd want to use that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Serving cart - nice miniature addition
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this cart 5 stars but for sturdiness across carpet and assembly instructions; nonetheless, it looks good, the space to hold an assortment of refreshment and the overall is not too bad. It sits in from the a tree purchased from Amazon that is still going strong. I recommend the tree and the cart.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice serving cart for the money. Assembly I feel would have been easier with a second set of hands. It was missing the tools for assembly and one of the tools pictured needed for assembly was incorrect. One of the bottle holders was completely broken off. The parts bag was open and many of the parts were scrambled throughout the box but fortunately all the other necessary parts were there. I love the look of the black glass against the metal and It rolls very easily on my carpet floor and looks very nice in my dining room. Its a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. DiPaulo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cart
customer_reviews.text: The price of this serving cart was really great. It's a beautiful piece of furniture. It was not all that easy to read the instructions putting it together but we managed. The picture showed the cart with clear glass shelves but it came with smoked glass which is just as pretty. It will serve both inside and out and that is why I purchased it. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Golden

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add a small bar style area to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add a small bar style area to any room. Classy, Wonderful look. However, when you roll it, it does feel a little less substantial, but we keep it parked in one spot and receive many compliments. It is plenty sturdy to hold a variety or bottles (your choice!) and glassware. Compared to the super high price point of similar models, we are very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Solvesit

customer_reviews.title: A bit shorter than I would have liked but still very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: A bit shorter than I would have liked but still very nice for the price. Perfect for an additional cocktail/tapas/dessert/coffee set up - helps to keep guests moving and the goodies flowing! Assembly was super easy with 2 people. One BIG assembly tip (as there are no instructions) put the bottom glass shelf in place BEFORE you tighten the center support.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little bit awkward but once all together the cart is very sturdy. It holds a lot of bottles. I use it to cart my bar inventory from a locked closet out to my open bar at a rental property. It is perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Elam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be taller. Wheels don't roll that well. Some of the chrome coating on the plastic pieces (endcaps and wheels) flaked off during assembly. Easy to put together. Purchased for the shape and to mostly be stationary, so it does the job. Still wish it was a little taller, though.
customer_reviews.author: Dennison Malhiot

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: The holes for screws didnt exactly line up so it took a while and 4 hands to hold n screw. ALSO, ONE OF THE SCREWS WERE MISSING. luckily my boyfriend does stuff like this all the time. We already had a tool box drill and multiple sizes of screws on deck
customer_reviews.author: BellaReana

customer_reviews.title: all the parts went together easily. I had no problem with screws and wheels
customer_reviews.text: This small bar cart is ideal for a small apartment. I assembled it without any help, but it would have gone faster with someone else on hand. Still, all the parts went together easily. I had no problem with screws and wheels, which were mentioned in other reviews. If you assemble it carefully you should be happy with it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Demetri Polites

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and fulfills my need.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely fits in the space I allocated. PAIN in the A for one person to assemble, but Amazon does offer an option to have an 'expert' assemble it for you for $100. If only.....
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mini Bar
customer_reviews.text: Nice mini bar for small spaces. Good quality, strong and elegant. Not too easy to maneuver on carpet, but I wanted a stationary mini bar so it works for me. The price $87 is about right based on the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Cutesy Bar cart!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Quality is great ESPECIALLY for the price! Great addition to my decor scheme. I thought it'd be a little larger in size but it's really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Tate

customer_reviews.title: Bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bar cart!!! It turned out exactly how I wanted!! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dreem White

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's a beautful accent piece and can ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's a beautful accent piece and can be used for a variety of purpuses (decoration, flowers, candles, frames, drinks, etc).
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for what I am using it for now ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for what I am using it for now. Wanted it for a cart to push between rooms while serving but the height of the cart is extremely short which makes it difficult to push and maneuver so just using it as a stationary cart to hold beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stable cart. Easy to assemble. There was no step by step instructions but I put it together in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: earth

customer_reviews.title: Nice place to stash my dranksss
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bar cart. Few pieces to put together and a bit on the small side but I wasn't looking for anything that took up too much space. Already getting compliments !
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Looks really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I had lots of licor here and there so I ordered it, my don put it together, looks ver nice and we love it!

customer_reviews.title: It's cool

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful

customer_reviews.title: ELEGANT AND WELL MADE!
customer_reviews.text: Elegant, high quality!! It’s very sturdy and looks very nice. Very easy to put together— didn’t even take me 5 minutes. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: quality was great!, the cart is quite short and small
customer_reviews.text: quality was great!, the cart is quite short and small.. Was not what I expected in regards to the size. The room i"m displaying it in is on the large scale, so this cart gets lost in the room.. We probably be purchasing a replacement..

customer_reviews.title: Lovely

customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very cute and just the right size for a small space. Perfectly priced.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart

customer_reviews.text: I need a better solution to keep shelves clean without streaking best so far is diluted dawn detergent

customer_reviews.title: A bit too fat guy in a little coat.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but a bit small for a 6'3" guy to wheel around. But it serves its purpose in a small apartment. Somewhat easy to assemble and the structure is well made.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Finally assembled this cart that was a Xmas gift. Took me a few hours but I am not handy with screws etc so would take a more handy person less time. Feels sturdy when put together. I have it holding several bottles and still feels sturdy. Love the look!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!

customer_reviews.title: because it easily can be moved to the living room
customer_reviews.text: It is handy to use when there is company, because it easily can be moved to the living room, and the bottom and top shelves can be used for refreshments/drinks. It was fairly easy to put together. Only one complaint--one wheel does not move as easily as the other three wheels. It seems fine if the cart if lifted, and one spins the wheel, however when the cart is pushed, the wheel sometimes seems to stick and does not work in union with the other wheels. The braking mechanism is not on, so I am not sure what the problem is. Probably it was a defect in that one wheel.

product_meta.title: Chrome Metal Bar Wine Tea Serving Cart with Tempered Glass
product_meta.description: This beautiful, x-design chrome-metal bar cart makes it easy to serve guests in style. This cart features black tempered glass on the top and bottom shelves. The casters wheels make it easy to transport and entertain your guests.
feature_bullets: Black Tempered glass top and base
Dimensions: 28 inches high x 18 inches deep x 25 inches wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
